title: Death Stranding 2 Seemingly Confirmed? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.20.22
description:
IGN's Stella Chung joins Tim to talk Death Stranding 2, PS Classics Trophy Support, Future Games Showcase, and more! 

Follow Stella: https://twitter.com/ParallaxStella

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Tim and Stella INtroduce Each Other
00:04:50 - Housekeeping

A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is up right now with Janet and Bless ranking the top 50 PlayStation 5 games. That’s available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.

Our Halo Season 1 Review is Up Right Now on Screencast

The Roper Report  -

00:06:40 - Norman Reedus Seems To Have Confirmed Death Stranding Sequel
00:13:03 - The All- New PLayStatin PLus Will Have Trophy Support for At Least Some Classic PS1 Games
00:21:20 - Future Games Show Moves to 11th June With 60 Minutes of Trailers and World Premieres
00:29:55 - Ads
00:32:03 - Evil Dead: The Game sells 500,000 units in under a week
00:38:00 - Thomas Haden Church Cast In Twisted Metal
00:42:36 - Pokémon Cards Just Added an Amazing New Ditto Mechanic
00:45:58 - Very cool Pokemon Thing
00:47:23 - Out today
00:49:22 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Janet & Krysta
Tuesday - Tam & Whitta
Wednesday - Bless & Janet
Thursday - Greg & Tim
Friday - Greg & Bless
